value.GSD:
[{"ElementTitle":"Service details","ElementText":"Locala offers a free and confidential contraception and sexual health service in clinics across Bradford. 

Locala Sexual Health Centres offer:
• A full range of contraception including implants, IUD's, condoms and emergency contraception
• Testing and treatment for people with symptoms of sexually transmitted infections
• Help and advice for unplanned pregnancy
• Chlamydia screening
• Services for men who have sex with men (MSM)
• PEP (Post Exposure Prophylaxis)
"},{"ElementTitle":"Opening times","ElementText":"When the service is overwhelmed with demand we may close earlier than the times listed below. Please check website or call 030 3330 9500 before starting your journey.

Monday to Thursday 1.15pm - 6.45pm
Friday 1.15pm - 4.45pm
"},{"ElementTitle":"Venue Type","ElementText":"Clinic"}]

[{"ElementTitle":"Service details","ElementText":""Spectrum Community Health provides a variety of free, confidential sexual health services across the Wakefield district. 

The WISH clinics are your pathway to Contraception and Sexual Health services: 
• Get FREE contraception - condoms, the pill, injections & implants, coils, patches & vaginal rings 
• Get emergency contraception, pregnancy testing and support if you think you are pregnant 
• Get tested, for all STIs including Chlamydia, Gonorrhoea,Trichomonas, HIV, Hepatitis & Syphilis

value.GSD:
[{"ElementTitle":"Service details","ElementText":"Kirklees Sexual Health Service offers advice and support around a range of contraception and sexual health. 

Services offered include: 
• Pregnancy testing 
• Emergency contraception (morning after pill) 
• Testing and treatment for sexually transmitted infections 
• Help and advice if you have an unplanned pregnancy                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Hepatitis B and C screening and Hepatitis B vaccinations
• Sexual problems 
• Sexual assault
• Full range of contraception including implant fitting and removal and Intrauterine contraception
• Safer sex advice 
• Free condoms and dental dams 
• Chlamydia screening
"},{"ElementTitle":"Opening times","ElementText":"When the service is overwhelmed with demand we may close earlier than the times listed below. Please check website or call 030 3330 9981 before starting your journey.

• Contraception

value.GSD:
[{"ElementTitle":"Service details","ElementText":"YorSexualHealth Harrogate Sexual Health Centre offers:

• Full range of STI tests and treatments
• Full range of contraception methods
• HIV testing, treatment and support
• ‘PEPSE’ (post-exposure prophylaxis sexual exposure HIV treatment)*
• Care and management following sexual assault
• Free condoms
• Hepatitis B screening/vaccination (sexual risk)
• Complex care, e.g management of syphilis, STIs in pregnancy
 
*PEPSE – please contact Specialist Sexual Health service (SSHS) before attending
"},{"ElementTitle":"General notes","ElementText":"YorSexualHealth is actively involved in a number of research projects. value.GSD:
[{"ElementTitle":"Service details","ElementText":"Kirklees Sexual Health Service offers advice and support around a range of contraception and sexual health. 

Services offered include: 
• Pregnancy testing 
• Emergency contraception (morning after pill) 
• Testing and treatment for sexually transmitted infections 
• Help and advice if you have an unplanned pregnancy                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Hepatitis B and C screening and Hepatitis B vaccinations
• Sexual problems 
• Sexual assault
• Full range of contraception including implant fitting and removal and Intrauterine contraception
• Safer sex advice 
• Free condoms and dental dams 
• Chlamydia screening
"},{"ElementTitle":"Opening times","ElementText":"When the service is overwhelmed with demand we may close earlier than the times listed below. Please check website or call 030 3330 9981 before starting your journey.

","MetricDisplayTypeID":7,"MetricDisplayTypeName":"HtmlText","IsMetaMetric":true},{"MetricID":88052,"MetricName":"Service details","DisplayName":"Service details","Description":"Directory - service details","Value":"","Text":"The SWEET project engages with female adult sex workers to provide alternative lifestyle choices and to tackle the anti-social behaviour, crime and disorder that may be associated with sex work. 

The SWEET project provides a holistic service incorporating elements of support, advice, information...","LinkUrl":"10045013","LinkText":"","MetricDisplayTypeID":7,"MetricDisplayTypeName":"HtmlText","IsMetaMetric":true}]
value.GSD:
[{"ElementTitle":"Service details","ElementText":"The SWEET project engages with female adult sex workers to provide alternative lifestyle choices and to tackle the anti-social behaviour, crime and disorder that may be associated with sex work. 

The SWEET project provides a holistic service incorporating elements of support, advice, information, advocacy and brokerage for sex workers. In partnership with other services we aim to best engage with them with a view to enabling a process of leaving sex work and making alternative positive lifestyle choices. An outreach service is also available to help engage with women who work from home.

Offers sexual health advice, STI testing and substance misuse support for women involved in sex work. Also has the SWANS service which provides advice and support to pregnant women with complex issues such as substance misuse, a history of offending or mental health concerns. Substance misuse midwife, drug support workers (CGL) and nurse prescriber available. 
"},{"ElementTitle":"Opening times","ElementText":"Drop-in:
Tuesday to Friday afternoons
Thursday drop-in can provide access to a nurse prescriber 4pm - 6pm

SWANS Service:
Thursdays 2pm - 4pm

Closed on Mondays, Saturdays and Sundays
"},{"ElementTitle":"Venue Type","ElementText":"Clinic"}]

value.GSD:
[{"ElementTitle":"Service details","ElementText":""Spectrum's sexual health teams in Barnsley deliver integrated services across the whole district. In the centre of Barnsley, the Gateway Clinic combines sexual health and contraceptive services to provide a full service for all your sexual health needs. 

We can provide all methods of contraception including:
• Emergency contraception
• Long acting reversible contraception (coils, ‘depo’ contraceptive injections and implants)
• Oral contraceptive pills
• Vaginal contraceptive rings


We also provide a range of services for the prevention and treatment of sexually transmitted infections (STIs), including:
• Chlamydia screening
• HIV testing, including 20 minute tests
• Hepatitis B vaccinations
• STI testing

"},{"ElementTitle":"Opening times","ElementText":""Opening times are subject to change. Check website or call ahead before starting your journey.
